articles.description: England make a strong start to life under Ollie Pope’s temporary captaincy, bowling out Sri Lanka for 236 on the first day the first Test at Old Trafford.
articles.title: England v Sri Lanka: Tourists bowled out for 236 at Old Trafford

articles.description: Atletico Madrid sign England midfielder Conor Gallagher from Chelsea for a fee believed to be in the region of £33m.
articles.title: Conor Gallagher: Atletico Madrid sign midfielder from Chelsea

articles.description: Jannik Sinner has been worn down by the investigation into his positive tests for a banned substance, says his coach Darren Cahill.
articles.title: Jannik Sinner: World number one 'worn down' by investigation, says coach Darren Cahill

articles.description: A Brazilian police investigation into allegations of domestic abuse by Manchester United winger Antony is closed, though prosecutors could still look the claims.
articles.title: Antony police investigation closed but prosecutors could look into allegations

articles.description: Manchester City are working on a deal to bring Barcelona midfielder Ilkay Gundogan back to the club.
articles.title: Ilkay Gundogan: Manchester City working on deal to sign Barcelona midfielder

articles.description: Nottingham Forest remain in talks with Arsenal over a possible £30m deal for striker Eddie Nketiah.
articles.title: Eddie Nketiah: Nottingham Forest in talks with Arsenal over £30m deal for striker

articles.description: Germany goalkeeper Manuel Neuer announces his retirement from international football, having won 124 caps.
articles.title: Manuel Neuer: Germany goalkeeper retires from international football

articles.description: Chelsea manager Enzo Maresca has cut England internationals Raheem Sterling and Ben Chilwell from his training squad, casting doubt on their Blues future.
articles.title: Enzo Maresca: Chelsea manager denies Raheem Sterling and Ben Chilwell have had brutal treatment

articles.description: Olympic medal-winning cyclist Matt Richardson could face a two-year ineligibility period under UCI rules after switching nationality to Great Britain, says AusCycling.
articles.title: Matt Richardson: Cyclist could face two-year ineligibility period after GB switch, say AusCycling

articles.description: World champion Nick Ball says his homecoming will be "special" as his promoter brands him one of the world's most exciting fighters.
articles.title: Boxing: Nick Ball promises "all-action fight" against Ronny Rios in Liverpool homecoming
